message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase [product name]. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for a mutually beneficial deal.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase the product. After considering the value and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value. However, to make this work on my end, I'd need to see the price closer to $1,275,000. This reflects the true worth of [product name] and its potential ROI.
I appreciate your response, Alice. After further consideration, I am willing to increase my offer to $1,250,000. I hope this brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
